comment: Professor Buonamia is hard to explain honestly. He cares about his students but he does not know statistics. I literally had to teach myself everything. He requires you to read the book before class and he confuses you more than you already are. If you are not good at math, DO NOT take him.

THE ABSOLUTE WORST! This man has absolutely NO IDEA how to teach. He spends every class rambling and going off topic, is not helpful whatsoever, and God help you if you make a complaint about him. Tried chewing us out for a confession on who "squealed" to his boss about his methods. If you're not the best in math and need to pass, DON'T TAKE HIM!!!

It's a great idea to read the chapters the class before because he expects you to come prepared with it. Although I think he's about to retire soon so you won't get the opportunity to have this amazing professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Caring

comment: He's a super caring and kind professor, and gives a bit of extra credit on tests and for coming to class. However, his lectures can be a bit confusing so I recommend at least looking over the textbook before class. Your grades are based on your test/quiz/HW scores, and the homework is extremely helpful for the tests and quizzes!

Not sure why this professor has such a low rating. Its an easy A because every single thing can be found on quizlet. Theres a quiz every week and 4 tests. Thats about it. Didnt purchase the textbook because who needs a textbook when you got quizlet! ����

I was quite shocked at the difficulty of this online class. The textbook doesn't help and the tests are NOTHING like the homework. Be prepared to cry. Hardest online class that I have ever taken. I was thankful that I got a C.

Wow. I was overwhelmed with the amount of work required of me in this class, The calculations are difiicult . The material really needs to be taught in the classroom where you can ask questions. It's like taking calculus online.

The classroom section of the class is so so so much easier. The online section requires you to watch hour long videos and attempt to figure out statistics that are very complicated. Just don't take it online.

THe online classs is impossible. You have to teach yourself and the material is very difficult. Most people flunk the tests. THe professor doesn't help you out when you are struggling. Take over the summer with an easier professor. I don't know how anyone passes and I'm an A student.

Easy online class. You only have a 10 question quiz you need to do every week. No discussions no other assignments just quizzes. Total of 4 tests including the final. Tests are only 30 questions each. If you have an 89 or above you don't need to take the final. I didn't purchase the book. You just need quizlet lol
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Would take again

comment: Worst professor you'll take in your life, don't put yourself thru this.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Here's the thing, Nick is a really nice guy but he is not good at teaching. If you want to do well in the class you need to teach yourself the material so definitely buy the book or you won't pass. Every class he passes out a sign in sheet so I suggest going. It's possible to get an A, grading based on 3 tests and a final replacing lowest grade.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Textbook essential to passing, because it is your main source of the information. Really nice guy, wish he could teach the material he knows so well. Only a few graded items, so if you aren't doing well by the drop date then I recommend dropping.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: This class is hard and he is not good at teaching the material, so be prepared to live off your book for learning. The tests are NOT easy, but they are multiple choice. He does give tons of extra credit, and I suggest sucking up to him to get a good grade because he will help. If you're registered for this class, good luck because you'll need it.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Don't take this professor for ECON 2300. He knows what he is doing but doesn't know how to teach the material. Prepare to teach yourself the entire course by reading the book. Going to class doesn't help but there are pop quizzes.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Love him! he could be confusing at times but see him and you get squared away. He is just a nice man and lectures can be boring but the subject is. He is hilarious and expect homework

Professor B cares about his students and wants them to pass! Stats is hard and he's a confusing teacher but he will help you if you ask. The book taught me the material but he will make an effort to make sure you do well. Mr. Buonamia is a good, caring man. He took our class to Taco Mac! Really cool guy but hard class!
Horrid Handwriting. Old School style teacher. Need the book but not the access code. Teaches through examples.

Avoid this professor at all costs. He clearly is good at statistics, but he cannot read people at all. He cannot explain, he cannot teach, and he expects you already know the material before you come into his class (not lecture, class). He needs to go back to being a statistician because he is one of the worst professors I've ever had. Bar none.

Very good teacher! It may be confusing sometimes but he is a human! If you have any issues in class, go to his office hours. He really helped me when i went to his office, we went through practice questions together. I was averaging a D, but towards the ending i started going to him for more help and it was clearer. Ended up with a B! tAKE HIM!
He's a nice guy but not a great teacher. If you can learn on your own, take him. If not then avoid this class. You gotta do the homework to pass really.
I enjoyed his class. Take him, he cares about his students passing.
Not a bad teacher like the reviews say. He started out a little rough (first year teaching) but gives tons of bonus points and really cares about students. I ask a ton of questions and he is helpful.

DONT TAKE HIM!!! He is literally the worst teacher I have ever had. This is a basic math course and he makes it insanely hard to understand. IF you take him do all the HW until you get 100's on all of them because if you don't you will fail. His lectures is just a collage of mumbling and reading off of another teacher's powerpoint.

I regret not dropping. Does not know how to teach the material. You can teach yourself but the tests contradict what he "teaches" and the book so there's no way to pass. Online homework helps more than he does and is essential to passing the class. This class was mandatory for my major  but I will probably have to retake-not with him of course.

I don't have much more to say than just absolutely terrible. Such a terrible teacher, terrible attitude, and terribly written tests. Never knows what the hell he is talking about, and doesn't help at all.

By far the worst class that I have ever taken. He contradicts himself on a daily basis because he will teach something one day and then teach it differently the next.  Loads of homework online that is necessary to save your grade at the  end of the semester. Extra credit given because he is usually wrong.
